title: Good Fucking Job Riot
body: No seriously, no sarcasm. I had the biggest grin on my face for like an hour after seeing the Gangplank VU #2. It's so nice to have lore that I can enjoy reading AND that carries over to in-game. I salute you Rito.

replies.body:
"WOW RIOT IS SO STUPID FOR BANNING A CHAMPION JUST FOR THE LORE"
after GP is back
"WOW RIOT IS SO GOOD AT COMBINING LORE AND CHAMPIONS"

Im happy at least one person is giving riot credit where credit is due. I was so tired of people complaining about how they disabled GP, and then riot says "oh were brining him back with a new skin and free skin"
i was seriously tempted to make a post saying"in your face, everyone who was like no don't disable GP"

I swear some people were so gulliable......."Wow riot you killed a champ just when I bought it, I demand my money back"
like yea riot is so evil they will kill a champ just for shits and giggles........riot does everything for a reason!
We got an update to an update
Hey, guess what! I couldn't care less about the free skin. I'd rather be able to play my main.

Thank you very much! Also, in case you didn't notice, Gangplank's introduction has been slightly modified to reflect the current situation in Bilgewater (and the new splash art of badassery has been added to his page). Check it out [here](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/gangplank/#champion-lore).

Hey Jardean, I like the new GP vo, but it really doesn't fit with his other skins now. Can skins like spec ops and sultan get the captain vo back? It fit them much better thematically, and a response to this would go a long way.
Gangplank looks like a skin for Lycan in DOTA2.

> [{quoted}](name=Vi is a Lesbian,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hf5KgKc4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-04T15:36:29.986+0000)
>
> No seriously, no sarcasm. I had the biggest grin on my face for like an hour after seeing the Gangplank VU #2. It's so nice to have lore that I can enjoy reading AND that carries over to in-game. I salute you Rito.

Riot did a great job with this event, I think. (Except for the damn quests, those were a pain in my fucking ass. Seriously, 5+ ARAM WINS, hundreds of CS, hundreds of kills, 6-10+ BMB wins, building the new items for no reason other than to complete the quest, and buying other Brawlers you don't want.) The story was engaging and dramatic and gave each character some personality (except MF, her backstory is really cliche in that it can literally be summed up like this: "Hello, my name is Sarah Fortune. You killed my parents, prepare to die.) and making them seem more like people than just avatars of death on the Rift trying to kill each other for no reason.

Graves is a thick-headed, hard-headed gunman with a bone to pick. He's a crack shot and not to be messed with.
Twisted Fate is a slick-talking card shark with bounties on his head. He always has an ace up his sleeve when trouble stirs.
Gangplank is the cruel and tyrannous ruler of Bilgewater with enemies. He's intimidating, he's commanding, and he's a TOTAL BADASS.

If they can keep this string of stories and lore going into other characters, I can't really wait to read more about the world of Runeterra.
